meta.title: AI Beauty Analyzer - Analyze Your Beauty Score with AI
meta.description: Upload your photo and get an AI-powered beauty analysis. Discover your beauty score and personalized feedback on facial features.

howItWorks.title: How Our Beauty Score Test Works

1.title: Upload Your Selfie
1.description: Take a clear selfie or upload an existing photo. Our AI works best with front-facing, well-lit images showing your full face.

2.title: AI Face Analysis
2.description: Our advanced AI analyzes your facial features, skin condition, symmetry, and proportions using the same technology as Prettyscale but with greater accuracy.

3.title: Get Your Beauty Score
3.description: Receive your attractiveness rating on a scale of 1-10, with detailed breakdowns of individual features and personalized enhancement recommendations.

promotion.title: Discover Your True Beauty Score Today
promotion.description: Experience the most advanced AI attractiveness test online - more accurate than Prettyscale! Get a comprehensive face score, detailed skin analysis, and personalized beauty insights powered by cutting-edge AI face analysis technology.

hero.title: AI Beauty & Attractiveness Test
hero.description: Get your face score instantly with our advanced AI facial analysis. Discover your beauty score, attractiveness rating, and personalized skin analysis in seconds.

uploadSection.title: Face Analysis Test
uploadSection.description: Upload your selfie for an instant attractiveness score and detailed facial feature analysis. Similar to Prettyscale but with advanced AI technology.

features.title: Complete Face Analysis
features.facialFeatures: Facial features score (eyes, nose, mouth, structure)
features.attractivenessRating: Overall attractiveness rating on a scale of 1-10
features.comparison: Comparison with beauty standards and personalized tips

accuracy.question: How accurate is this AI attractiveness test?
accuracy.answer: Our AI beauty analyzer provides a highly accurate assessment based on facial symmetry, proportions, and features that are universally considered attractive. While beauty is subjective, our algorithm has been trained on thousands of faces to identify common beauty standards across cultures.

comparison.question: Is this similar to Prettyscale?
comparison.answer: Yes, our face analysis tool is similar to Prettyscale but uses more advanced AI technology for greater accuracy. We provide more detailed breakdowns of facial features and skin analysis, along with personalized recommendations.

calculation.question: How is my beauty score calculated?
calculation.answer: Your face score is calculated by analyzing key facial features (eyes, nose, mouth, structure), skin quality, symmetry, and proportions. The AI compares these measurements to beauty standards and generates an overall attractiveness score on a scale of 1-10.

privacy.question: Is my photo stored or shared?
privacy.answer: Your privacy is our priority. Your uploaded photos are processed for analysis only and are not permanently stored or shared with third parties. All processing happens securely on our servers and images are deleted after analysis.

skinAnalysis.question: Can I use this for skin analysis too?
skinAnalysis.answer: Yes! Our AI beauty analyzer includes comprehensive skin analysis as part of its assessment. It evaluates skin clarity, tone, texture, and overall complexion, providing specific recommendations for skin care improvements.

improvement.question: How can I improve my attractiveness score?
improvement.answer: After your analysis, we provide personalized recommendations based on your specific results. These may include tips for better photo angles, lighting, skincare suggestions, or features to emphasize. Remember that our tool is meant to be fun and informative!

emptyResult.title: Your Face Score Analysis
emptyResult.description: Upload your selfie to get an instant attractiveness rating and detailed facial analysis

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about our mission, team, and the story behind {brandName}
about.metaDescription: Learn about our team and the story behind AI Beauty Analyzer. Cozyai LLC is the creator of CraveU AI, a product focused on NSFW AI Chat with industry-leading model effects and image generation capabilities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At AI Beauty Analyzer, we're providing a fun and innovative way to explore AI-powered beauty analysis. Created as a quick project by the team behind CraveU.ai, this tool demonstrates the capabilities of modern AI in a playful context.

team.title: Our Team
team.weAre: We are <company>Cozyai LLC</company>, the team behind <product>CraveU.ai</product>.
team.expertise: We specialize in NSFW AI Role Play with industry-leading model effects and image generation capabilities.

conversations.title: Intelligent Conversations
conversations.description: Engage in natural, flowing conversations with our advanced AI models that understand context and respond with personality.

imageGeneration.title: Image Generation
imageGeneration.description: Create stunning, customized images with our state-of-the-art AI image generation technology.

customization.title: Deep Customization
customization.description: Tailor every aspect of your experience with extensive personalization options.

emotionalIntelligence.title: Emotional Intelligence
emotionalIntelligence.description: Our AI understands and responds to emotional cues, creating more meaningful interactions.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your data and conversations are protected with enterprise-grade security and privacy controls.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: This project was created in just 20 minutes. It's meant to be a fun toy for everyone to enjoy, so don't be too harsh on it!

about.tagline: An entertaining project from LLC - Expand AI interaction boundaries
